item.title: Terminal enhancements
item.description: Dropdown terminal It seems guake is an obvious choice for everyone, but tilix gives terminator features of splitting a window. 1 $ yaourt -S tilix-bin To use tilix as a dropdown terminal, you need to setup a key with tilix -q as action. Install zsh 1 $ sudo pacman -S zsh Install git 1 $ sudo pacman -S git Setup oh-my-zsh 1 2 $ wget https://github.
